name: Outerbase
headline: The interface for your database
description: Outerbase is the interface for your database. Companies use Outerbase to view, edit, and modify their data and even generate beautiful visual dashboards without having to write a single line of SQL.

founders.name: Brandon Strittmatter, Founder
founders.description: Brandon is co-founder of Outerbase, the interface for your database. Modern teams use Outerbase to view, edit, query, visualize, and share their data. Prior to co-founding Outerbase, Brandon led design for DigitalOcean's managed solutions (App Platform, Serverless, and DBaaS (Database as a Service), and was the founding designer of Containership, a startup building a multi-cloud Kubernetes platform.

founders.name: Brayden Wilmoth, Founder
founders.description: Brayden is a co-founder of Outerbase, the interface for your database. Prior to founding Outerbase, Brayden was a software engineering manager at Walmart leading multiple teams of engineers on various platforms for the native applications and web experiences. At his time there he guided teams in making key data-driven decisions, in which he took his experience from to assist in building Outerbase.

# We make working with data easy
## With Outerbase's AI-powered platform, engineers, researchers, and analysts alike can work with any database—with safety and security guaranteed.
[Get started for free](https://www.outerbase.com/<https:/app.outerbase.com>)Book a Demo
AITablesQueriesDashboardsData Catalog
![Ebay](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/ebay.69c45965.svg)![Pinterest](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/pinterest.9dd805e8.svg)![Arc](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/arc.a871d7ff.svg)![Zapier](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/zapier.8fc21148.svg)![Dribbble](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/dribbble.855541eb.svg)![Justworks](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/justworks.369492bb.svg)![Google](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/google.91d6b0db.svg)
AI
## AI that knows your database
[Learn more about AI->](https://www.outerbase.com/</ai/>)
### Ask EZQL™
Ask EZQL™ questions for instant insights about your data.
### AI-powered editor
Write queries with the help of AI to fix mistakes and make suggestions.
### Auto generate Charts
Transform your data into stunning visualizations instantly using AI.
![Ai chat](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/ai-2-sm.e864f64b.webp)
### Ask EZQL™
Ask EZQL™ questions for instant insights about your data.
### AI-powered editor
Write queries with the help of AI to fix mistakes and make suggestions.
### Auto generate Charts
Transform your data into stunning visualizations instantly using AI.
Providers
## Partnered with the best of the best
We connect instantly to the top database providers to make it even easier to access your data.
[DigitalOcean![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/digitalocean-bg.7ac248ce.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/digitalocean/>)[Neon![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/neon-bg.7c5a1a5c.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/neon/>)[Turso![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/turso-bg.d1d2253a.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/turso/>)
[Cloudflare![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/cloudflare-bg.ccdec800.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/cloudflare/>)![Place logo here](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/fruit-label.f41d0b3b.webp)![Star so bright](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/star-sticker.7f0aa95b.svg)![Star so bright](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/jet-sticker.dcccb5f6.webp)Interested in becoming a provider?![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/add-bg.cdcc2f53.webp)
Tables
## Navigate your data smarter
[Learn more about Tables->](https://www.outerbase.com/</tables/>)
### Like a spreadsheet with more features
We built our table editor from scratch to be snappy, responsive, and comfortable.
### Customize with table plugins
A constantly expanding network of plugins to make navigating data faster and more effecient for your team.
### Embed our table everywhere
As part of our Astra library, the Outerbase table is fully embeddable anywhere.
![Tables](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/tables-sm.0fd2d2f0.webp)
### Like a spreadsheet with more features
We built our table editor from scratch to be snappy, responsive, and comfortable.
### Customize with table plugins
A constantly expanding network of plugins to make navigating data faster and more effecient for your team.
### Embed our table everywhere
As part of our Astra library, the Outerbase table is fully embeddable anywhere.
Dashboards
## Get insights instantly
[Learn more about Dashboards->](https://www.outerbase.com/</dashboards/>)
### Self-serve analytics
Build dashboards from the ground up or have AI build them for you.
### AI-generated charts
Generate charts directly in your conversations with AI.
### Embeddable analytics
Embed your charts anywhere with our open-source web components.
![Dashboards](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/dashboards-2-sm.3a2c3fd6.webp)
### Self-serve analytics
Build dashboards from the ground up or have AI build them for you.
### AI-generated charts
Generate charts directly in your conversations with AI.
### Embeddable analytics
Embed your charts anywhere with our open-source web components.
Databases
## Bring your own database
Connect to most SQL or NoSQL databases. All your data in one place.
[Postgres![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/postgres-bg.39e1d063.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/postgres/>)[MySQL![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/mysql-bg.f8bc414f.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/mysql/>)[SQLite![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/sqlite-bg.9ee25646.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/sqlite/>)[MongoDB![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/mongo-bg.74827f33.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/mongodb/>)[ClickHouse![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/clickhouse-bg.df7b909e.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/clickhouse/>)[Microsoft SQL Server![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/ms-sql-server-bg.03509ab7.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/microsoft-sql-server/>)[Snowflake![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/snowflake-bg.f6b3e93a.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/snowflake/>)[Google BigQuery![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/bigquery-bg.9a786662.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/google-bigquery/>)[Amazon Redshift![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/redshift-bg.905c769f.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/amazon-redshift/>)[View all databases![Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/general-bg.fd3f506b.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/</connections/>)
Data Catalog
## Take control of your database
[Learn more about Data Catalog->](https://www.outerbase.com/</data-catalog/>)
### Define business terms
Define core business terms to help your team and AI understand key insights.
### View relational diagrams
Quickly create relational diagrams to help your team visualize how your data connects.
### Create virtual relationships
Add virtual relationships to your columns to increase understanding of data without editing the schema.
![Data Catalog](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/data-catalog-1-sm.4db392db.webp)
### Define business terms
Define core business terms to help your team and AI understand key insights.
### View relational diagrams
Quickly create relational diagrams to help your team visualize how your data connects.
### Create virtual relationships
Add virtual relationships to your columns to increase understanding of data without editing the schema.
## Secure at any scale
Whether you are a fortune 500 or an indie dev your data privacy is our biggest priority.
[Learn more about security at Outerbase->](https://www.outerbase.com/</security/>)
### Two-Factor Auth
Two step sign in process with your favorite authentication app.
### Data Breach Checks
We verify your password has not been exposed in any known data breaches.
### Custom Access
Restrict access at the lowest level using database roles and permissions.
### HIPAA Compliant
We protect patient health details, keeping them safe and confidential.
### SOC 2 Type 2 Compliant
We protect patient health details, keeping them safe and confidential.
### Data Encryption
Data is encrypted in using AES and RSA encryption algorithms.
### SSH Tunneling
Securely connect to your private database wherever it's located.
### Private AI Models
Our AI models are not trained on your data, keeping it private.
![Space, at your fingertips](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/stars.d71684a3.webp)
![astronaut](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/astronaut.59d23dff.webp)

generated_description:
**Outerbase: The Interface for Your Database**

Founded in 2022 and proudly part of Y Combinator's Batch W23, Outerbase is on a mission to simplify database interaction for everyone. Based in Pittsburgh, PA, this agile startup consists of a focused team of four, enabling companies to seamlessly engage with their data through an intuitive interface that requires no coding—no SQL needed.

Outerbase's core selling point? It empowers engineers, researchers, and analysts to manipulate their database with confidence—safely and securely. By harnessing the power of AI, users can effortlessly visualize data, build dashboards, and generate insights with tools like **Ask EZQL™**, a feature that allows for natural language questions about data.

### Key Features:
- **User-Friendly Interface:** Replace SQL complexity with an intuitive UI that integrates with various database providers like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB.
- **AI-Powered Tools:** Generate charts and receive query suggestions in real-time, eliminating common coding pitfalls. 
- **Dashboards and Analytics:** Build customized or AI-generated dashboards, making insights just a click away.
- **Security First:** Compliance with HIPAA and SOC 2 Type 2, plus robust security measures like two-factor authentication and data encryption.

### Why Choose Outerbase?
Outerbase blends the world of developer tools, generative AI, and analytics to create an accessible platform that’s particularly beneficial for startups and enterprises alike. Whether you're a seasoned data engineer or a small company looking to harness data insights, Outerbase provides the tools needed to make data-centric decisions without the traditional hurdles.

For those interested in simplifying their data interaction process, you can explore more about Outerbase or get started for free at [Outerbase’s website](https://www.outerbase.com).

In summary, if you want to view, edit, and analyze your data without the complexities of SQL, Outerbase is your go-to solution. As they say, "We make working with data easy."
